name: Space Runner (GaryD)
description:
Developed as a small project for on old Twitter #30daydev event, Space Runner is a HTML shoot-em-up with your ship skirting around the outside destroying the enemy ships spiralling from the centre.

  • Random waves of enemy ships to destroy or avoid.
  • Bonus section after each level. Avoid the asteroids for bonus points.

Currently, it plays on desktop browsers only.
